2164.subject: MLML
2164.descrlong:
MLML 135:Phys Marin Algae-   Students gain an understanding of the adaptations of marine algae to their environment. Requires field trips for specimen collection and shipboard experiments. Focuses on the biology of seaweeds and phytoplankton. Offered through Moss Landing Marine Laboratories (MLML); contact SEP program office for MLML registration procedures.

(Prereq: Include Junior and Senior and Post Bac and Graduate)
